snippet: A half-hearted intervention will not stop Assad’s barbarism.
abstract: Op-Ed article by writer and activist Yassin al-Haj Saleh contends the empty rhetoric and inaction by global community regarding Syria has been catastrophic, with thousands dying under brutality of Pres Bashar al-Assad; fears a half-heated military intervention directed solely at chemical weapons will do little to protect Syrian people or bring stability to region.
lead_paragraph: A half-hearted intervention will not stop Assad’s barbarism.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
